attributes.action: Tell the public the truth about the Lisbon treaty every detail
attributes.background:
Do we lose our armed forces 
Trident
Be forced to use the euro

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you want the Government or Parliament to do to inform the public about the Lisbon Treaty.

You can find out more about what's in the Treaty here:

https://www.europarl.europa.eu/factsheets/en/sheet/5/the-treaty-of-lisbon

In 2010, the House of Commons Library published a paper about implementing the Treaty, which came into force in 2009:

https://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/SN05331/SN05331.pdf

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
